Title: NEPRO / PwC Staff Secondments - Financial Consultants
Description: x2 NEPRO / PwC Staff Secondments - Financial Consultants

Title: Cleadon Flood Allievation
Description:
NEPRO Ltd seeks to appoint a consultant to carry out an assessment of the flood risk in Cleadon Village, South Tyneside, to provide an appraisal of risk mitigation options, an outline design for the preferred option and then continuation to detailed design and construction phase support on behalf of South Tyneside Council.
The letting of each stage of works shall be dependent on satisfactory progress of the appointed consultant during each phase and upon funding being made available for the next phase.

Title: NEPRO NEPO503 Vendor neutral managed service for specialist professional services (framework for the provision of)
Description:
Neutral vendor solution for specialist professional services including consultancy. NEPRO Ltd (now BLOOM) were appointed by NEPO via an open OJEU process in September 2015. The Contract commenced December 2015 for 4 years and is currently working with over 70 Public Sector organisations across UK
Available to all public sector organisations. The categories covered are : Asset Management & Delivery, Community & Housing, Construction, Design & Engineering, Education & Learning, Environment, Sustainability & Waste, Environmental Health & Consumer Protection, Facilities Management, Finance, Audit & Accounting, Health & Wellbeing, Highways & Transport, Information, Communication Technology, Leisure, Culture & Heritage, Marketing, Media & Public Relations, Organisational & Change Management, Planning & Development Control, Safeguarding, Social Care (Children), Social Value & Regeneration & Business Strategy
Supplier [Name|Address|Ref type|Ref Numb: [BLOOM|Sunderland Software Centre, Tavistock Place, Sunderland, SP1 1PB|||No|No]
